author: esammer
msg: - Added unit tests for ChannelDriver / ChannelDriverThread (although we black box test the latter).

author: esammer
msg: - ChannelDriverThread now properly detects (separate) source and sink failures, records the exception, and exits cleanly to the ChannelDriver (its parent). - Added a big fat warning about my ugly repurposing of LifecycleState for something that isn't LifecycleAware. I'm gross.

author: esammer
msg: - Added CounterGroup for holding a collection of counters (for metrics).

author: esammer
msg: - ChannelDriverThread now properly opens / closes sources / sinks.

author: esammer
msg: - Initial addition of a refactored flume node.
